item.title: My plan for a CRISPR-KO library and scRNA-seq
item.description: DISCLAIMER I assume that you have working knowledge of vectors (plasmids) used in molecular biology, and know what an RNA or sgRNA is. Anything else is not important or will be explained. My master’s thesis will be published soon on the NUS scholar’s bank. While I’m proud of what I’ve managed to do, the wet lab side of the work almost broke me! For instance, an image in the thesis showing a western blot of DLG5 Knock-Out (KO) took almost 3 months of work.
